statements: SELECT * FROM production_data
SELECT product_id, production_date, quantity_produced FROM production_data
SELECT product_id, defect_count FROM production_data WHERE quantity_produced > 100
SELECT * FROM production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_id, process_notes FROM production_data WHERE defect_count > 0
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE quantity_produced > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_produced FROM production_data WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY quantity_produced ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE process_notes LIKE '%high priority%' AND defect_count > 0;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_produced) AS total_production FROM production_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_production > 500;
SELECT AVG(defect_count) AS avg_defects, MAX(quantity_produced) AS max_production FROM production_data WHERE production_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductionData;
SELECT ID, ProductName, ProductionQuantity FROM ProductionData ORDER BY ProductionDate DESC;
SELECT ProductName, ProductionQuantity FROM ProductionData WHERE ProductionQuantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM ProcessImprovement WHERE ImprovementArea='Quality';
SELECT ID, ImprovementArea FROM ProcessImprovement ORDER BY ID ASC, ImprovementArea DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE ProductionQuantity > 100 ORDER BY ProductionDate DESC;
SELECT ProductName, ProductionDate FROM ProductionData WHERE ProductionDate >= '2021-01-01' AND ProductionQuantity > 50;
SELECT ProductName, SUM(ProductionQuantity) AS TotalProduction FROM ProductionData GROUP BY ProductName;
SELECT ProductionData.ProductName, ProcessImprovement.ImprovementArea FROM ProductionData JOIN ProcessImprovement ON ProductionData.ID = ProcessImprovement.ProductionID;
SELECT ProductionData.ProductName, ProcessImprovement.ImprovementDescription FROM ProductionData LEFT JOIN ProcessImprovement ON ProductionData.ID = ProcessImprovement.ProductionID;
SELECT * FROM production_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity, defects FROM production_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM employee_data WHERE employee_department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_data WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT improvement_id, improvement_date, improvement_impact FROM process_improvement WHERE improvement_cost < 5000;
SELECT * FROM production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM production_data WHERE defects > 0
SELECT * FROM employee_data WHERE employee_department = 'Engineering'
SELECT improvement_id, improvement_description, improvement_impact FROM process_improvement ORDER BY improvement_date ASC
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employee_data JOIN process_improvement ON employee_name = improvement_impact
SELECT * FROM productions ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, production_amount FROM productions WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_quantity > 10 ORDER BY defect_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM processes;
SELECT * FROM productions ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_amount ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, production_date FROM productions WHERE production_amount > 100 ORDER BY production_date;
SELECT id, product_name, production_date FROM productions WHERE production_amount > 50 AND product_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.id, p.product_name, COUNT(d.id) AS num_defects FROM productions p LEFT JOIN defects d ON p.id = d.id GROUP BY p.id, p.product_name HAVING num_defects > 0 ORDER BY num_defects DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_role, p.process_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN processes p ON e.id = p.id WHERE e.hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM production_data;
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_data WHERE production_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, defect_type FROM defects_analysis ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE review_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT downtime_reason, downtime_duration FROM downtime_analysis WHERE production_date = '2021-11-20';
SELECT * FROM production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_data WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT defect_type FROM defects_analysis;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM employee_performance GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(performance_rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM process_improvement WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
